amendment.description: Amendment sought to give the lead agency, in the event of new or unforeseen information, the authority to extend by two six-month periods the arbitrary 30 month time limit the bill imposes on permit approval.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 112-590 to give the lead agency, in the event of new or unforeseen information, the authority to extend by two six-month periods the arbitrary 30 month time limit the bill imposes on permit approval.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hastings (FL) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 162 - 252 (Roll no. 463).
